Package clientshipgame

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    clientshipgame
    This is our main class that accepts arguments if put in.
    Communicate
    This class contains message sending/recieving functions and is used to communicate with the server
    Controller
    Controller takes care of any key strokes and handles them appropriately
    Game  
    GUI
    This is the main GUI class that handles all our images for the display panel
    Message
    Message class contains a basic message object with a name and list of arguments
    Minimap
    Draws a MiniMap window for the player to see
    RotateImage
    RotateImage45Degrees.java - 1.
    Ship
    Ship handles different ship types, and keeps track of a specific ships variables
    World
    World class draws our the world environment to our viewing port
